forum.name: Share draft lesson plan and reflect on the planning process
forum.intro:
Take a few moments to reflect on your lesson planning process. Share your draft lesson plan and your thoughts about the process here. 

Here are some considerations:

  • Were the checklists you created that align OER with practices useful in building your lesson plan?
  • What was most helpful in determining activities that will engage students in learning?
  • What other tools and resources did you use? Would you use them again?
  • Finally, do you feel this planning process has prepared you for teaching with the OER you selected?

Once you complete your draft lesson plan, save a copy to share with others for feedback. Be sure that it is as complete as possible. Upload a copy of your lesson plan to this discussion forum with any notes or questions for the other course participants and the facilitator who will review your plan.  This exercise will provide you with valuable information that you may use to revise your lesson.
